titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Barcelona Savings Bank poster collection], [collection dates] RL.11570
titlestmt.author: Richard Collier

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-01-24 11:53:10 -0500.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

origination.label: source
origination.corpname: John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History

did.abstract: Bank founded in Barcelona in 1926 as Caja de Ahorros Provincial de la Diputacion de Barcelona and renamed Caixa d'Estalvis de Catalunya in the 1970s. Collection consists of a scrapbook of 39 reproductions of a poster campaign for the bank. Some posters are identified by theme, such as "Peace" or "Today and Tomorrow". Posters are in Spanish and feature art deco images and the Catalan shield. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Bank founded in Barcelona in 1926 as Caja de Ahorros Provincial de la Diputacion de Barcelona. Name changed to Caja de Ahorros de la Generalidad de Calaluna 1931-1939; reverted to original name after the Spanish Civil War. Name Catalanized to Caixa d'Estalvis de Catalunya (Caixa Catalunya) around 1977; later known as Catalunya Banc. Nationalized 2011 as part of a governmental reorganization of financial services. Acquired 2015 by multinational firm Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria (BBVA) and absorbed into BBVA 2016.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Barcelona Savings Bank poster collection were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a purchase in 2017.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Barcelona Savings Bank poster collection, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2017-0030

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of a scrapbook of 39 reproductions of a poster campaign for the bank. Some posters are identified by theme, such as "Peace" or "Today and Tomorrow". Posters are in Spanish and feature art deco images and the Catalan shield. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
